title: Another day of healing
creator_credit: Graham Bye, Leon Bram, Film Partnership (Vic.) and Associated World
brief_description: In an attempt to cater for the medical needs of over 200,000 people annually, the Austin Hospital works twenty-four hours a day. The film shows the activities of all the departments of the Hospital and briefly tells some of its history. Written by John Hindle.
creator_credit_for_label: Graham Bye, Leon Bram, Film Partnership (Vic.) and Associated World
